metadata.title: CVE-2016-3830 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: codecs/aacdec/SoftAAC2.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 4.xbefore 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before2016-08-01 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (devicehang or reboot) via crafted ADTS data, aka internal bug 29153599.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
